scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run export
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file cloudfront.yml --stack-name jsonlint-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM && (aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name jsonlint-stack || aws cloudformation wait stack-update-complete --stack-name jsonlint-stack) && npm run build && npm run export && BUCKET=$(aws cloudformation describe-stack-resources --stack-name jsonlint-stack --logical-resource-id WebsiteBucket --query "StackResources[0].PhysicalResourceId" --output text) && echo $BUCKET && aws s3 sync ./out s3://$BUCKET --delete
